column5: On behalf of my family I want to give you all a sincere and heartfelt appreciation for your support over the past few years. It was 8 years ago today that our daughter passed away. I had been ice fishing that very morning with my son. My world took a bit of a turn when we got home that day. Needless to say that was the end of ice fishing that season. We have had a great deal of support and healing over time.  . I got my son back into hard water fishing gradually as my wife. It took some time to get back to enjoying the thrill of ice fishing as for a while it represented something not so great to my son. Over the years we have overcome that hurdle and are spending some great family time together on the ice again  . We finally had a real fish fry last weekend. My son finally this year got that magical tug on the line. A five pound whitie. Sorry I did not have the camera with me, but his smile would have been to large for the screen. Thanks again for the support over the years and I am thankful that we have been able to encourage other members on the board. God bless Jennifer.
Thanks for posting this Jennifer, it's great to hear.  All the best to you and yours.
Good to hear...while we live all over we are family here.  Art
Sorry for your loss but it's nice to hear you're healing as a family. Fishing has a way of bringing us through many of life's challenges. Dan O.
I'm sure that she is looking down and happy to see you out there fishing as a family again.
Thanks again to everyone who responded, it means alot to us. Thanks again. Irishfield we will do the trip next year.
